message: Let's start fair. This is a good deal for both of us!
I understand you want a larger share, but this is more equitable considering the inflation we're facing.
I understand the inflation is hitting you harder, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it more evenly this time.
Time is running out, and we both lose if this drags on. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.
